"Ran": "Attention, all ARKS. A powerful DOLL has been detected in the depths of the canyon."
"Based on past data, we believe it to be the Overseer-type DOLL Snidael Vera."
"Snidael Vera makes use of sound waves to produce devastating attacks. Study its movements and stay composed."
"Numerous enemies are also expected to appear along the way. Please be extremely careful!"
